nodes.text: Battle for Naboo is a Star Wars Legends DK Readers Level 3 title that retells the story of the Battle of Naboo from the film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. It was written by Lisa Stock and was published by DK Publishing on January 16, 2012.
The book was reissued with new cover art as part of the Learn to Read with Star Wars: Darth Vader Level 3 box set on December 12, 2017.
Can the Jedi help to save Naboo and prevent war in the galaxy?
